name: the #*DREAMulator
description:
#SWORDDREAM, #SNAILDREAM ... what's your #*DREAM?

this started out as a joke but i think it's just a legit prompt generator now. i welcome any and all suggestions for words to add.

the #SWORDDREAM was coined in this tweet by Michael T. Lombardi (@TrebuchetOps) on May 31, 2019, and immediately became a popular movement among marginalized & progressive game creators seeking to divorce the worst parts of the OSR community, forging ahead with a new kind of fantasy dream. i consider myself a SWORD DREAM game creator, but i was not directly involved in the movement's inception.

(generator contains references to sex & sexuality, soft drugs, alcohol, and violence.)
